dialog.intro: You wanna eat, you hustle. This drop’s easy — don’t screw it up.
dialog.success: You did alright. Maybe you got legs in this city.
dialog.failure: Rookie mistake. Don’t let it happen again.

title: Tainted Package

dialog.intro: I didn’t cut it, I swear. Someone’s playing with my stash.
dialog.success: Clients calmed down? Good. I owe you.
dialog.failure: They’re still pissed. I’ll handle it, but this stinks.

objective: Defuse a bad deal or bribe a client.

title: Courier Loyalty

dialog.intro: They’re stepping on my turf. I need to know you’re down.
dialog.success_loyal: Didn’t expect loyalty. You ride with me now.

objective: Choose to defend Maya or warn her rival.

title: Courier’s Endgame

dialog.intro: This last run? It’s all or nothing. Cops, rivals, bad roads.
dialog.success: You earned your name. I’ll never forget this.
dialog.failure: They got the drop on us. Next time, we bleed slower.

objective: Survive a risky route or escape with partial delivery.
